title: misuse
comment: the technology will eventually leak and will be accessible to people with bad intentions. how would that be addressed? what are the consequences of that. People can be put to sleep and then kidnapped students can take advantage to study 24/7 in the last few days of exams

title: improve quality of life
comment: Quality of the life of the patience or even ordinary people can be improved potentially using this device, they can even regulate their sleep and live a longer and healthier life

title: security
comment: It is not known as whether there are any security or privary risks associated with the use of the implants. Could this be potentially controlled by hackers and attachers. It is good that it could be controlled remotely by some one else for example a doctor making changes to his patient implant

title: regulation
comment: rules and regulations should be put in place as who is allowed under whcih circumstances when, for how long etc to use the implant for

title: self reparing
comment: It is good that the device does not need contant service and maintenane and is able to repair it self.

title: malfunction
comment: malfunction of such a device could be catastrophic. If for example someone with this implant is driving and suddently falling sleep could result in his death and even death of other people.

title: human control
comment: This could potentially lead to a point that people could be controlled directly or indirectly.
